summary: An isolated shack in a snowy region, near Bleak falls barrow. NO load doors, NO snow inside, NO DLCs needed, CoT compatible.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][color=#3c78d8][/color][color=#6fa8dc]- Description -[/color][/size]

[size=3]A small shack in an isolated, snowy area with a nice view of the Whiterun plains. Follow the path leading up from the western watch tower to Bleak falls barrow.
Shack has no load door, the snow stops once you go inside (even CoT) and has a few activateable object like lighting fire or lanterns. [/size]

[color=#ff7700][size=3][u]NO DLCs ARE REQUIRED
CLIMATES OF TAMRIEL IS REQUIRED for CoT file[/u][/size][/color]

[size=3]! ! ! Key is located in the firewood storage ! ! ![/size]

[size=3][youtube]weqOiWoJYZQ[/youtube][/size]

[color=#6fa8dc][size=5]- Features -[/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Navmeshed, TES5Edit cleaned, Map and Horse marker, Idle markers
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Alchemy and Enchanter (switch between them), Tanning rack, Woodchopper, Grindstone, Cook pot
(cook pot can be moved after the fire is lit and fire extinguished after the cook pot is moved back)
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Activatable stuff, named and safe storage, shrine of Kyneareth
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Unique dagger
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Functional Key (activate it to lock shack door)
[color=#6fa8dc]->[/color] Sit on ledge, Lay on bed and other sitting markers[/size]


[size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]- My Other Mods -
[/url][/size][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod

[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]Special thanks to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/6140922/?]KettleWitch[/url] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53774/?]Bloodthron dagger[/url]
[/size][/font]
[/center]
author: 1xmiha
